title: not able to sign in to my pixel 3a phone after factory reset
content: i am not able to reach the log in screen in my pixel 3a device after factory resetting, when i am trying to set up the phone its asking for copy apps and data, i am pressing dont copy & then i am getting screen promoting to  "use my google account instead"  and when i am pressing the option to "use my google account instead" its going back to copy apps & data screen. please help.
